Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Dorint Maison Messmer Baden-Baden in Baden-Baden, you'll be minutes from Theater Baden-Baden and Kurhaus Baden-Baden. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Staatliche Kunsthalle Baden-Baden and Casino Baden-Baden.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 152 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Baden-Baden? This hotel has 4734 square feet (440 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The nearest airports are:
Karlsruhe (FKB-Karlsruhe - Baden-Baden) - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Stuttgart (STR) - 70.4 km / 43.8 mi

The preferred airport for Dorint Maison Messmer Baden-Baden is Stuttgart (STR).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Dorint Maison Messmer Baden-Baden is Frankfurt (FRA-Frankfurt Intl.) - 145.5 km / 90.4 mi.
